subject: Missing order urgent help. SSN5469
description_text:
SSN5469 tracking SF6047207530869

Hi I’m still waiting on a response regarding the shifter and the parcel where about as at the moment it seems to be lost. I have contacted the delivery company to no help. 

Hope you can help me resolve the issue. 


Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Patrykorzel04,    Your package is being delivered as scheduled. No need to worry. Here is your final-mile tracking number: H01SRA0053671256

Hi thank you for the quick response, I will wait patiently.

Could you please confirm if the control box is with the shifter? As at the
moment I’m still missing the control box.

Best regards
patryk


On Mon, 5 Jan 2026 at 8:45 am, service@simsonn.com

If you could please confirm as at the current moment in time I will not be
able to use the things that got shipped to me. As stated on the website,
Clutch pedal Plus X and control box.

Thank you again

Hi, once again I’m messaging as Its still not clear if I will receive a control box with my order. Could you please confirm either that the control box is with the H shifter or it’s not included. As per your website it made it clear it was part of the purchase
